There are 4 categories and within these, there are catalogs, about 30 in which more. Lately when loading these categories an error appears and does not show the catalogs. There is another way to insert these codes and not so many errors. The web is:<URL> (the category that makes the most mistakes is wine and gourmet) I am waiting for your news. thanks.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have received two orders recently with nice discount coupon cards located inside the boxes for 10% of orders (and it suggested that you could share this code with friends).  The code was good until February 28th.  Unfortunately, the other employee in our marketing department, tossed all those materials not realizing that the postcard contained a discount code.  Can you guys please email me that code so that I might be able o use it on my orders that I need to do this week.
Thanks from a loyal customer,
<NAME>
